FREEZING_TEMPERATURE.name: FreezingTemperature
FREEZING_TEMPERATURE.comment: Water freezes if temperature is lower than this value

MELTING_TEMPERATURE.name: MeltingTemperature
MELTING_TEMPERATURE.comment: Ice melts if temperature is higher than this value

AVERAGE_INTERVAL_HOURS.name: AverageIntervalHours
AVERAGE_INTERVAL_HOURS.comment: How much hours is between each two average temperature measurements, only used if MeasurementType is set to 'Daily average'

SPECIFIC_HOUR.name: SpecificHour
SPECIFIC_HOUR.comment: At which hour the temperature is measured, only used if MeasurementType is set to 'Specific hour'

MEASUREMENT_TYPE.name: MeasurementType
MEASUREMENT_TYPE.comment: Specifies how the temperature is measured

FIX_SNOW_ACCUM.name: FixSnowAccum
FIX_SNOW_ACCUM.comment: Whether the fix for 'Snow and ice' world option is applied

RESPECT_SNOW_ACCUM.name: RespectSnowAccum
RESPECT_SNOW_ACCUM.comment: Whether the mod behaviour should be affected by 'Snow and ice' world option, meaning that disabling 'Snow and ice' will also disable ice melt/freeze done by this mod

FreezeFlowingSourceBlocks.name: FreezeFlowingSourceBlocks
FreezeFlowingSourceBlocks.comment: Whether the flowing water-source blocks should get frozen (base game does not freeze any flowing blocks)
